title: Ep 161: Gua Sha Revealed with Sandra Lanshin Chiu, L.Ac
itunes:title: Ep 161: Gua Sha Revealed with Sandra Lanshin Chiu, L.Ac
itunes:subtitle: Kate tries out a new morning make-up routine after a late night and Doree completes another life checklist item. Then, the Licensed Acupuncturist and Chinese Herbalist Sandra Lanshin Chiu, , L.Ac joins them to describe the history and effects of Gua Sh...
description:
Kate tries out a new morning make-up routine after a late night and Doree completes another life checklist item. Then, the Licensed Acupuncturist and Chinese Herbalist Sandra Lanshin Chiu, , L.Ac joins them to describe the history and effects of Gua Sha, what led her to pursue Chinese medicine, and the many steps of her amazing skincare routine.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).
